Title: Relates to a pharmacy's obligation to properly dispense or refill a prescription for a drug or device, or a non-prescription drug or device
Summary: Provides that a pharmacy is obligated to properly dispense or refill a prescription for a drug or device, or a non-prescription drug or device regardless of the ethical, moral or religious beliefs of any employee of such pharmacy.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the obligation of a pharmacy to properly dispense or refill a prescription for a drug or device, or a non-prescription drug or device regardless of the ethical, moral or religious beliefs of any employee of such pharmacy
